metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9032 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the media-playlists feature inWordPress before 3.9.x before 3.9.3 and 4.x before 4.0.1 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1+dfsg-1').
